item.description:
Hello everyone,

In the interest of tapping into some other great content in the biotech and life science industry and expanding our collective networking scope, we are teaming up with the Babson Health & Life Sciences club in April for a daylong event. Babson will be hosting its annual Industry Forum on April 15th from 8:00 a.m. (registration and breakfast) until 5:30 p.m. (networking and cocktail reception from 4 - 5:30).

Attendees will represent a diverse set of sectors, from suppliers (pharmaceuticals, biotech and medical
devices) to healthcare delivery and services, as well as a broad range of functions, from marketing to business development to investors. Keynote speakers include Matthew Emmens, CEO Vertex Pharmaceuticals (9:00 - 10:00 a.m.) and Jonathan Bush, CEO athenahealth (3:00 - 4:00 p.m.), plus many other interesting sessions throughout the day (and lunch).

For more information, directions, agenda, speakers and to register please visit www.babsonhealth.com. **If you register BEFORE March 31 the cost is $30** Tickets at the door are $50.

We hope to see you there...if not, we'll look forward to catching up again in May
item.name: Boston Biotech Meetup: April at Babson
